title: 2021 Masters and 'WrestleMania 37' Overreactions With Kevin Clark and David Shoemaker
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons is joined by Kevin Clark to discuss the 2021 Masters Tournament (7:45) and the upcoming NFL draft (39:15). Then Bill talks with David Shoemaker immediately after the conclusion of 'WrestleMania 37'; they discuss the decision to split the event into two days, Bad Bunny’s excellent performance, a riveting match between Sasha Banks and Bianca Belair, Roman Reigns retaining his belt, and more (58:30).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
